use anchor_lang::prelude::*;

use instructions::*; use state::game::Tile;

pub mod errors; pub mod instructions; pub mod state;

// this key needs to be changed to whatever public key is returned by “anchor keys list” declare_id!(“Fg6PaFpoGXkYsidMpWTK6W2BeZ7FEfcYkg476zPFsLnS”);

#[program] pub mod tic_tac_toe {

use super::*;

pub fn setup_game(ctx: Context<SetupGame>, player_two: Pubkey) -> Result<()> {

instructions::setup_game::setup_game(ctx, player_two)

}

pub fn play(ctx: Context<Play>, tile: Tile) -> Result<()> {

instructions::play::play(ctx, tile)

}

}
